div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
ðŸ“¡ All Events Flow Here
â€¢ invoice.received
â€¢ lead.scored
â€¢ candidate.screened
â€¢ payment.processed
â€¢ support.ticket.created
â€¢ sales.demo.completed
â€¢ code.deployed
â€¢ user.churned

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PATTERN 1: EVENT CORRELATION
Connect disparate events to find patterns
Example: Lead Journey
1. lead.scored (Marketing)
2. demo.booked (Sales)
3. trial.started (Product)
4. invoice.sent (Finance)
5. customer.onboarded (CS)
Insight: 'Leads from webinars convert 3x faster'

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PATTERN 2: PREDICTIVE ANALYTICS
Use historical events to predict future
Example: Churn Prediction
Signals:
â€¢ login.frequency decreased 50%
â€¢ support.tickets increased 3x
â€¢ feature.usage.declined
â€¢ nps.score < 6
Prediction: '80% chance of churn in 30 days'
Action: Trigger retention campaign

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PATTERN 3: DIAGNOSTIC ANALYTICS
Understand WHY something happened
Example: Why did revenue drop 15%?
Root cause analysis:
1. lead.volume normal
2. demo.show.rate dropped 20%
3. Correlation: New demo.booking.bot deployed
4. Diagnosis: Bot confirmation emails in spam
Fix: Whitelist bot email domain

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PATTERN 4: PRESCRIPTIVE ANALYTICS
Recommend optimal action
Example: Pricing Optimization
Inputs:
â€¢ customer.segment (Enterprise, SMB)
â€¢ deal.size
â€¢ competitive.intel
â€¢ close.probability
Recommendation: 'Offer 15% discount (85% chance of close)'
Agent: Auto-generate proposal

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
PATTERN 5: LEARNING LOOPS
AI learns from outcomes, improves over time
Example: Lead Scoring Refinement
1. LeadScoring-Agent scores lead = 80/100
2. Sales rep books demo
3. Outcome: lead.converted = true
4. Feedback loop: 'High score â†’ conversion' (model reinforced)
5. Model accuracy: 75% â†’ 82% after 1000 examples
Continuous improvement without human intervention

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
DASHBOARDS & ALERTS
ðŸ“Š Executive Dashboard
â€¢ Revenue, churn, efficiency metrics
â€¢ Real-time updates
ðŸ“ˆ Function Dashboards
â€¢ Sales: Pipeline, win rate, velocity
â€¢ Finance: Cash flow, AR/AP aging
â€¢ CS: CSAT, NPS, churn risk
ðŸš¨ Automated Alerts
â€¢ Churn risk >70%: Notify CS manager
â€¢ Deal stalled >30 days: Notify sales rep
â€¢ Invoice overdue: Escalate to finance

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
AI AGENTS CONSUME INSIGHTS
ðŸ¤– ChurnPredictor-Agent
Reads: Pattern 2 predictions
Action: Trigger retention campaign
ðŸ¤– DealOptimizer-Agent
Reads: Pattern 4 recommendations
Action: Suggest pricing, upsells
ðŸ¤– ProcessImprovement-Agent
Reads: Pattern 3 diagnostics
Action: Identify bottlenecks, propose fixes

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
USE CASE 1: Revenue Operations
Problem: Can't see full customer journey
Solution: Pattern 1 (Event Correlation)
â€¢ Track: lead â†’ demo â†’ trial â†’ customer
â€¢ Insight: 'Leads who see demo within 48h convert 2x'
â€¢ Action: Deploy faster demo.booking automation

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
USE CASE 2: Proactive Customer Success
Problem: Reactive churn (customers leave before we know)
Solution: Pattern 2 (Predictive Analytics)
â€¢ Monitor: usage, support, NPS, payment events
â€¢ Predict: Churn risk 30 days ahead
â€¢ Action: Human CS rep reaches out proactively

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
USE CASE 3: Process Optimization
Problem: Month-end close takes 15 days
Solution: Pattern 3 (Diagnostic Analytics)
â€¢ Analyze: Which steps take longest?
â€¢ Diagnose: Manual reconciliation = 60% of time
â€¢ Action: Deploy ReconciliationBot (reduce to 3 days)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
USE CASE 4: Sales Enablement
Problem: Inconsistent win rates across reps
Solution: Pattern 4 (Prescriptive Analytics)
â€¢ Learn: Top rep strategies (demos, pricing, objections)
â€¢ Recommend: 'Use demo deck v2 for Enterprise'
â€¢ Action: ProposalGenerator-Agent uses best practices

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
USE CASE 5: Continuous AI Improvement
Problem: AI agent accuracy plateaus
Solution: Pattern 5 (Learning Loops)
â€¢ Capture: All agent decisions + outcomes
â€¢ Learn: What worked, what didn't
â€¢ Improve: Retrain model monthly (accuracy +5-10%)

svg.text: Data Spine: 5 Analytics Patterns for AI-Native Organizations
